Address: 3 MACARTHUR PLACE, SANTA ANA, California, 92707, United States of America
CompanyDescription:
Banc of California (NYSE: BANC) is a $10 billion company headquartered in Irvine, California. It was formed through the merger of four of Southern California's premier community banking franchises.  Over the past five years, Banc of California has grown to be the largest bank headquartered in Orange County, with over 100 banking locations and 1,700 employees.  This year, Banc of California expects to fund 20,000 loans to California's diverse businesses, entrepreneurs and communities.

	Banc of California was recently recognized by Forbes Magazine as one of America's Top Banks, by the Orange County Business Journal as the Fastest Growing Mid-Size Company headquartered in Orange County, and as the largest independent bank in California with an Outstanding rating for community development.

	Banc of California's mission is to be California's Bank offering a full range of banking services including private, commercial, retail and institutional banking. For more information please visit www.bancofcal.com
